amendment.description: Amendment provides that only United States citizens or United States nationals are permitted to make an individual contribution to any candidate running for Federal office.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section which prohibits non-citizen individuals from making contributions in connection with Federal elections.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Fossella to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Fossella amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 282 - 126 (Roll No. 276).
